### IEmacs.ReadOnly method
</br>


#### Sets the text to read only.

```csharp
public IEmacs ReadOnly(bool value = true)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | If set to `true`, the read only initial text. |

### Return Value

The current [`IEmacs`](../IEmacs.md) instance.
